qas.question: What was the Water Boiler that Feyman worked on?
Where was Feyman sent after his work at Los Alamos?
What did Feynman help produce at the Oak Ridge Facility?
Which weapon did Feynman found to not be feasible?
Where did Feynman work on the "Wateer Boiler"?
What was the Water Boiler that Feynman had no influence on?
Where was Feynman imprisoned after his work at Los Alamos?
What did Feynman help destroy at the Oak Ridge Facility?
Which weapon did Feynman find to be feasible?
Where was the "Water Boiler" worked on without Feynman?

context: Feynman's other work at <a4_0><b9_0>Los Alamos<b9_0/><a4_0/> included calculating neutron equations for the Los Alamos "Water Boiler", a small <a0_0><b5_0>nuclear reactor<b5_0/><a0_0/>, to measure how close an assembly of fissile material was to criticality. On completing this work he was transferred to the <a1_0><b6_0>Oak Ridge facility<b6_0/><a1_0/>, where he aided engineers in devising <a2_0><b7_0>safety procedures<b7_0/><a2_0/> for material storage so that criticality accidents (for example, due to sub-critical amounts of fissile material inadvertently stored in proximity on opposite sides of a wall) could be avoided. He also did theoretical work and calculations on the proposed <a3_0><b8_0>uranium hydride bomb<b8_0/><a3_0/>, which later proved not to be feasible.
